miic.core.stream.corr_trace_to_obspy¶

corr_trace_to_obspy(corr_trace)[source]¶

Convert a correlation trace dictionary to an obspy trace.

Convert a single correlation trace (or a list of) in an Trace (or Stream) object.

Parameters:corr_trace (dictionary of type correlation trace or list of these) – input date to be converted
Return type:Trace if corr_trace is a dict and Stream if corr_trace is a list of dicts
Returns:st: the obspy object containing the data
